I have sensitive skin and use a Food Grade Organic brand roll on without any ill effects. Like most natural deodorants they use essential oils and botanicals which some people may have a reaction to. I have also seen some magnesium based ones but haven't tried any myself. Natural deodorants seem to be trial and error; definitely better than conventional but still got to watch the ingredients. ...
